title: jeremypwr
author: jeremypwr
content: UFC 294Multi Master Challenge   Prizes1st place: 3 mBTC Free Bet2nd place: 2 mBTC Free Bet3rd place: 1 mBTC Free BetThe Rules are similar to the original Sportsbet.io Multi Master that we all enjoyed so muchRulesa)  Predict the winner of each match (earn 1-2 points)b)  Predict how many matches will NOT go the Full Distance (will be adjusted accordingly if matches get cancelled)Odds @ https://sportsbet.io/sports/mma/ufc/ufc-294-makhachev-vs-oliveira-2/matchesMatches(2 points each)13. Islam Makhachev vs. Alexander Volkanovski (must get 13 correct to proceed)12. Kamaru Usman vs. Khamzat Chimaev(must get 12 correct to proceed)11. Magomed Ankalaev vs. Johnny Walker10. Ikram Aliskerov vs. Warlley Alves9. Said Nurmagomedov vs. Muin Gafurov(1 point each)8. Tim Elliott vs. Muhammad Mokaev7. Mohammad Yahya vs. Trevor Peek6. Javid Basharat vs. Victor Henry5. Abu Azaitar vs. Sedriques Dumas4. Mike Breeden vs. Anshul Jubli3. Nathaniel Wood vs. Muhammad Naimov2. Jinh Yu Frey vs. Viktoriya Dudakova1. Bruno Silva vs. Shara MagomedovNOT go the Full Distance   Make sure your Prediction is in this format    Example13. Islam Makhachev 12. Kamaru Usman 11. Magomed Ankalaev 10. Ikram Aliskerov 9. Said Nurmagomedov 8. Tim Elliott7. Mohammad Yahya 6. Javid Basharat 5. Abu Azaitar 4. Mike Breeden 3. Nathaniel Wood 2. Jinh Yu Frey 1. Bruno Silva NOT go the Full Distance 6Sportsbet.io has been kind enough to sponsor my Prediction Contests and Promos for a while now.Sportsbet.io is a sports betting website; therefore these Prediction Contests and Promos are catered to those who actually bet on/discuss sports.If you are unsure if you qualify, just shoot me a PM.  Thank you for your cooperation.

comments.author: jeremypwr
comments.body: Make sure you OPT IN to win Free Bets for the Makhachev vs. Volkanovski main eventhttps://sportsbet.io/promotions/fight-of-the-nightGear up for the ultimate UFC title fight:Opt in between 16.10 - 20.10Place a minimum 3-leg multibet on any sporting eventEnsure predictions are settled by 20.10 23:59 GMTReceive your reward based on the value of your highest multibetUse your reward on the Makhachev vs. Volkanovski main event
